cex 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Changelog

Get tickers

tickers.Rd

Get tickers for a selection of quote currencies.

tickers(symbols)

Arguments

symbols

A vector of ticker symbols to be used as quote currency in pairs

Value

A tibble

Details

Wraps https://cex.io/api/tickers/{symbol1}/{symbol2}/.../{symbolN}.

Examples

# All pairs with USD as quote.
tickers("USD")

#> # A tibble: 87 × 11
#>    time                pair     low     high     last     volume volume30d price_change

# All pairs with ETH or BTC as quote.
tickers(c("ETH", "BTC"))
